forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 58F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by some light rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Cloudy skies will become partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Decreasing cloudiness and windy. High around 55F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 58F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning then clearing and windy with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning then clearing and windy with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. N winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 54F. N winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
